channel.title: clean on Ritesh's Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in clean on Ritesh's Ramblings

item.title: First post!
item.description: Ok, I lied. This is a remake of the old blog by the same name. Deleted all the old posts which I thought were meaningless drivel. Incidentally, Drivel seems to be a good desktop blogging client. Available through your nearest apt repository. Was following news of the Apple WWDC quite closely even though I don’t own any working apple products. The only apple product I have is a 5 year old broken iPod.
